00278       const DiscreteFunction& getFactor(FactorID id) const
00279       {
00280          FactorMap::const_iterator pos = factors_i.find(id);
00281          if(factors_i.end()==pos)
00282          {
00283             throw new NoSuchElementException("MaxSumController::getFactor()",
